DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Transverse Friction Massage ( TFM ) Latent Myofascial Trigger point ( MTrP ) effective make technique two different way .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Transverse Friction Massage Latent Myofascial Trigger Points Anterior Deltoid Muscle
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator divide two group . The investigator apply TFM similar way , investigator cause local twitch response ( isolated contraction muscle fiber contain latent trigger point ) one group . So investigator want know whether effectiveness technique due local twitch response , compare group . The investigator asses Strength , range motion , overall , pressure pain threshold evaluate pain sensitivity progress .
DOC.criteria: Having latent myofascial trigger point anterior deltoid Visual local twitch response Having active Myofascial trigger point anterior deltoid Having suffer injury surgery upper limb . Pain first evaluation session . Not obtain local twitch response
